item.title: Introduction to Religious Studies | Welcome
item.description: Hi there, welcome to Introduction to Religious Studies! In this online course we’ll be exploring the fundamental basics of what a religion is, how and why people study religion, and also discussing some real world examples of religious thought, tradition, and practice. The course is open to absolute beginners; you don’t need to know anything about religion or religious studies before we start, but if you already have some experience then you’ll definitely find useful material and ideas as we move forward.
